full_title: Control Arduino with Python and pyFirmata | GeeksForGeeks
description: In this article, we will learn how to link an Arduino to a Python script in order to operate the Arduino. This example of constructing a 4-bit binary up-counter using Python script to control Arduino helps us understand this better.
